item.title: Creating Floating Label/Placeholder for Input with React
item.description: To make the application fancy, front-end web developers usually visualize it using animations or other effects. And now I am going to explain one of the methods how to apply the most famous floating label effect to the input field with React.

item.title: Internationalize Your App With React
item.description: Nowadays any viable product pursues the goal to grow globally. That means the successful online product is supposed to have minimum two language locales. One of them is english as an international language, and the other one depends on the spoken language of the target audience (usually domestic).

item.title: Content “First” in Web Design
